headline.print_headline: FDA Questions Evidence for Lower-Risk Tobacco Product
headline.main: FDA Questions Evidence for Lower-Risk Tobacco Product

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. health regulators have questions about the data submitted by tobacco maker Swedish Match in its bid to become the first company to market a smokeless tobacco product as less harmful than cigarettes.
docs.snippet: U.S. health regulators have questions about the data submitted by tobacco maker Swedish Match in its bid to become the first company to market a smokeless tobacco product as less harmful than cigarettes.
